title: 245156 - INFORMATION on CSIS SUMMER 2026 Computer Science / Engineering / Information Technology Opportunities

details.value:
THIS POSTING IS TO PROVIDE INFORMATION ON HOW TO APPLY TO:

245153 - CSIS SUMMER 2026 Computer Science / Engineering / Information Technology Opportunities
Input JOB ID 245153 in the SEARCH POSTING block or Click "Search job postings" under the keyword search and select the K26 co-op work term TO APPLY ***

WHO CAN APPLY

Canadian citizens eligible for a Top Secret security clearance.


SECURITY REQUIREMENTS

Candidates must be able to obtain a Top Secret security clearance. This process involves a security interview, a polygraph, and a background investigation that includes credit and financial verifications.


4, 8, 12 OR 16 MONTH WORK TERM

Work Duration: 4, 8, 12, or 16 months (An 8 month employment period is registered as 2 separate, consecutive work terms, and a 12 month employment period is registered as 3 separate, consecutive work terms , and a 16-month employment period is registered as 4 separate, consecutive work terms). Please state CLEARLY in your cover letter whether you are available for 4, 8, 12, and/or 16 months.

Note For Engineering Undergraduate Students: Before applying to this posting, it is your responsibility to have completed the appropriate pre-requisite courses for this length of work term, and to understand how this length of work term affects your academics. Engineering undergrads -- If this means you will be registered in a 5th or higher work term, the full co-op tuition fee (equal to two installments) will be charged for each extra work term above the mandatory four.
